title: Diamond support main with plenty of competitive experience LFT
body: I can also sub for adc and mid if needed. Add me in game instead of commenting here please :)

replies.body: I will add you mate! I think you have great potential!

Fantasy Esports is Recruiting have a look at the thread to see if you are interested 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/ucjHqthc-fantasy-esports-is-recruiting
